column5: Our place is close to Waco, the city of Magnolia and the Silos. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the location in the country, on large ponds stocked with fish. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). Kitchen and baths furnished with all amenities. Large dining room for group meals for family gatherings.
column8: Cross C Ranch Cabin, 3BR2B, on 112 acres near Waco
